sentences.sentence: Can one become a professional clarinetist on a 3.5 reed?
sentences.translation: 用3.5号哨片能成为职业单簧管演奏家吗？

sentences.sentence: He was the first jazz clarinetist to play with symphony orchestras.
sentences.translation: 他是第一个和交响乐团合作的爵士单簧管演奏家。

sentences.sentence: Benny Goodman was a classically trained clarinetist. So too were most of the Jazz Artists.
sentences.translation: Benny Goodman就是一个演奏古典音乐出身的单簧管演奏家，正如大多数爵士艺术家一样。
